document_data.name: ''Jolly Pelican''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Jolly Pelican''''' was a ship stationed out of [[Luskan]] that traveled a specific route along the [[Sword Coast North]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
The ''Pelican'' was used to transport individuals to and from the [[Revel's End]] prison, which was situated on the coast of the [[Sea of Moving Ice]] in the [[Frozenfar]].

When needed, the ship made the {{SI|350|mi|k}} voyage from Luskan to Revel's End, transporting prisoners from the coastal city to the isolated prison. Staff members from Revel's End that needed relief from duty were then shuttled along the same route, south to Luskan for leave.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the vessel was targeted as an asset by [[Bethra]] an assocaite of [[Varrin Axebreaker|Varrin]] from [[Clan Axebreaker]].
